text: Cun az u noumed sudand, ʙaroi masvarat ʙa kanore raftand va ʙuzurgtarinason guft: «Ojo namedoned, ki padaraton az sumo ʙa nomi Alloh pajmon girifta va pes az in niz dar haqqi Jusuf kutohi kardaed? Man az in sarzamini Misr ʙerun nameojam, to padaram maro icozat dihad jo Alloh dar haqqi man dovarie kunad, ki U ʙehtarini dovaron ast
